head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DENENHOLZ, RICHARD SAMUEL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DENENHOLZ, RICHARD SAMUEL

block.p: DENENHOLZ-Richard Samuel Agustus Binion on May 3, 2000. Eighty four years, a Mason and Shriner. Beloved husband of Sally Kraft. Dear brother of Alma Kaplan, Amelia Orringer, Grace and the late Marshall, Daniel, Jessica Levin, Reginald, Victor and Devora Schwebel, beloved friend of Trini A. Montes. Loving brother-inlaw, uncle, great uncle and friend to all. Services today at Gramercy Park Memorial Chapel, 2nd Ave at 10th Street, NYC At 1:00 PM.

Dear brother of Alma Kaplan, Amelia Orringer, Grace and the late Marshall, Daniel, Jessica Levin, Reginald, Victor and Devora Schwebel, beloved friend of Trini A. Montes. Loving brother-inlaw, uncle, great uncle and friend to all. Services today at Gramercy Park Memorial Chapel, 2nd Ave at 10th Street, NYC At 1:00 PM.
